topics.learning_outcomes: State the function of the heart. Describe the structure of the heart. Demonstrate how to take the pulse.
Identify male and female parts of the body. Describe changes that occur at puberty in human beings.
Explain the importance of good ventilation. Explain ways of providing good ventilation in buildings. Demonstrate ways of treating a suffocated person.

subtopics: Symptoms of airborne and waterborne diseases
Prevention of airborne and waterborne diseases
topics.learning_outcomes: Name common airborne and waterborne diseases in Zambia. Describe symptoms of common air borne and water borne diseases. Describe how to prevent air and water borne diseases.
Identify causes of malaria. State the symptoms of malaria. Describe ways of preventing and treating of malaria.

subtopics: Care and treatment for AIDS patients
topics.learning_outcomes: Describe ways in which STIs and HIV are transmitted. Identify ways of preventing the spread of HIV and STIs. Describe the care and treatment for AIDS patients.
Mention the substances which are harmful to the human body. State the harmful effects of substance abuse on the body. Explain the effects of drinking alcohol.
Explain the importance of water in the soil. Mention ways in which water can be retained in the soil. Demonstrate the drainage rates of soils.

subtopics: Advantages and disadvantages of chemical fertilizers
topics.learning_outcomes: Explain what organic and inorganic fertilizers are. Demonstrate how to prepare compost manure. Explain the importance of maintaining a supply of composted materials. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of chemical fertilizers in agriculture.
Identify different types of non-flowering plants. Identify use of ferns and fungi.
Identify the different types of invertebrate animals. Investigate the basic structure of insects. Explain the difference between insects and spiders. State ways in which insects are useful.

subtopics: Harm caused by pests and parasites
topics.learning_outcomes: Identify common pests and parasites in the local environment. Describe the harm caused by pests and parasites on plants and animals. Explain how pests and parasites can be controlled using local plant materials and commercial chemicals. Explain how chemical pesticides can cause harm to the environment.

subtopics: Good and bad conductors of electricity
topics.learning_outcomes: State what electricity can do. Identify sources of electricity. Identify electrical appliances used at home, school and in the community. Identify good and bad conductors of electricity. Describe the uses of good and bad conductors of electricity. Explain methods of conserving electricity in homes and schools.

subtopics: Good and bad conductors of heat
Uses of heat conductors and insulators
topics.learning_outcomes: Describe what heat is. Determine the temperature of human body; boiling water; and air inside and outside the classroom. Distinguish good and bad conductors of heat. Identify materials which are good insulators. Explain the uses of good and bad conductors of heat.

subtopics: Instruments for measuring mass and weight
topics.learning_outcomes: Identify instruments used to compare how heavy objects are. Demonstrate the effect of gravity on objects. Distinguish between mass and weight.
Identify various instruments and apparatus used to measure volume. Measure the volume of liquids. Measure the volume of various regular and irregular solid objects.
Explain what simple machine is. Identify six kinds of simple machines used in the home and school. Demonstrate the use of simple machines in doing work.
